oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First example of a heptacyclic tetranuclear, five- and six-coordinate titanium complex, [{((PrO)-Pr-i)(2)Ti(mu(3)-O)TiCl((PrO)-Pr-i)((OC6H4)(2)PPh)}(2)]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PRIYA, S
BALAKRISHNA, MS
MAGUE, JT
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: olefin polymerization catalysts
ray crystal-structure
structural-characterization
coordination chemistry
molecular-structures
ligand
rhenium(v)
alkoxide
oxide
bonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Novel heptacyclic tetranuclear titanium complex containing penta- and hexacoordinated titanium centers was synthesised by the reaction of bis(o-phenol)phenylphosphine with titanium tetrachloride.
